meanings.definition: A transliteration of the Hebrew name מַדַּי (Maddai), a son of Japheth in the Hebrew Bible.
meanings.english_definition: A transliteration of the Hebrew name מַדַּי (Maddai), a son of Japheth in the Hebrew Bible.

examples.sentence: Madaih is mentioned in Genesis 10 as one of the descendants of Noah.
examples.translation: マダイは創世記10章でノアの子孫の一人として言及されています。
